name: Brand new room with FREE breakfast and parking
description:
Enjoy this spacious brand new hotel room with a great location! Easy commuting around Boston! A 5 min walk to Red Line/Andrew and it will take 10 mins to get to Downtown.
FREE hot breakfast. FREE parking. shuttle to/from airport Cruise Terminal, Convention Center.
Perfect for families, friends, and business travelers.
DUE TO NEW REGULATIONS IN THE LIGHT OF COVID-19 WE CURRENTLY SERVE GRAB&GO BREAKFAST ANS SOME AMENITIES MIGHT NOT OPERATE. TEXT FOR DETAILS.

The space
There are two queen beds and a pull-out sofa. Up to 6 people.
Free cable TV with free HBO.
Extra bed/Air mattress available.
This room is a part of the hotel complex and you are welcome to use 24 hours gym and business center. Free shuttle from airport, Cruise, Convention.
2 mins walk to the beach.
South Bay Shopping Plaza with lots of stores, restaurants, and AMC movie cinema is just 2 minutes walk.

Guest access
Gym, business center<
